original: I'm sure Mom will get mad.

original: I will try again, thank you.

original: He and I were in the same camp then.

original: I had a cousin who lived in Boston.
translated: Avevo un cugino che viveva a Boston.

original: A game of Go starts with an empty board and Black plays first unless playing with a handicap.
translated: Una partita di Go inizia con un tavolo vuoto e il Nero gioca per primo a meno che non giochi con un handicap.

original: He was reluctant to go by himself.
translated: Era riluttante ad andare da solo.

original: He called me up almost every day.

translated: Io sarei dovuto andare con Tom.

original: The doctors heal many sick people.

original: I can't sleep without a pillow.

original: Tom tried to talk Mary out of leaving.
translated: Tom ha cercato di convincere Mary a non andarsene.

original: No one lived on the island at that time.

original: I don't want them to be angry.

original: She forgot to do her homework.

original: Thanks for all your hard work.

original: I've explained the problem to Tom.

original: I didn't get paid as much as I expected.

original: The climate here is milder than in Moscow.
translated: Il clima qui è più mite rispetto a Mosca.

original: My camera is different from yours.
translated: La mia macchina fotografica è diversa dalla sua.

original: I have only leaves and apples.
translated: Ho soltanto delle foglie e delle mele.

original: I want to live in a Native American reservation.
translated: Voglio vivere in una riserva di nativi americani.

original: I erased my hard disk by accident.
translated: Ho cancellato il mio hard disk per sbaglio.

original: I've got to get to a meeting.
translated: Io devo andare a una conferenza.

original: You don't have to help me.

translated: Forse lo state facendo in modo sbagliato.

original: I don't remember his exact words.
translated: Non ricordo le sue parole esatte.

original: Tom and Mary said they didn't know how to swim.
translated: Tom e Mary dissero che non sapevano nuotare.

original: She said that she liked the party.
translated: Disse che le piaceva la festa.

original: Sami purchased a ranch in Texas.
translated: Sami ha acquistato un ranch in Texas.

original: Apart from that, I don't know anything.
translated: A parte quello, non so niente.

original: I'm going to be there very soon.

original: That wasn't your decision to make.

original: She lost her balance and fell.
translated: Ha perso l'equilibrio ed è caduta.

original: Everybody knew Tom was in trouble.
translated: Tutti sapevano che Tom era nei guai.

original: I know Tom was proud of me.
translated: So che Tom era orgoglioso di me.

original: Many newspaper reporters attended the trial.

translated: Smettetela di sprecare il mio tempo.

original: I see no need for you to do that.
translated: Non vedo alcuna necessità per voi di farlo.

original: You don't have to get up early.

original: This model is difficult to sell.

original: Why don't we take the subway?

original: Melancholy is the nurse of frenzy.

original: Esperanto - for you to understand the world.
translated: Esperanto - perché voi capiate il mondo.

original: Tom and I have a big house.

original: Can I tell you a secret?

original: They said they weren't afraid of anyone.

original: I don't want to study German.

original: He was working at the office yesterday evening.
translated: Lui stava lavorando in ufficio ieri sera.

original: I can't believe Tom fell for it.

original: Could you explain that to me?

original: Could you please drive me home?
